entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 1:00 PM AST Friday 03 March 2023

Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
